#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
int main()
{
    ll t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        ll n,ans=0,a,b,f;
        cin>>n;
        ll ar[n];
        cin>>a;
        for(ll i=1;i<n;i++){
        cin>>b;
        f=b-a;
        if(f>=1)
            ans++;
        a=b;
        }
        cout<<ans<<endl;



    }


}
